Package xmlParser

Class PortXMLManipulation

java.lang.Object
xmlParser.PortXMLManipulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GeneralPersistency<Port>, IdentifiablePersistency<Port>
public class PortXMLManipulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements IdentifiablePersistency<Port>
This class implements the database for ports. It implements the singleton pattern, and is supposed to be used through the IdentifiablePersistency interface. It is one of the four entry points to the xmlParser package.
Author:
simon
